events.name: eds-accordion-open
events.description:
fires when accordion is opened, pass event detail 
{ headingText, additionalText, headerIcon }

events.name: eds-accordion-close
events.description:
fires when accordion is closed, pass event detail 
{ headingText, additionalText, headerIcon }

properties.name: caretsOnRight
properties.description: Describes if the caret is moved to right side, left by default.

properties.name: filledHeaders
properties.description: Describes if the header receives a background color and removed borders.

properties.name: iconsOnRight
properties.description: Describes if the (optional) icon is moved to right side, left by default.

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Describes if multiple accordion panels can be opened.

EDSAccordion.description: An **accordion** menu is a vertically stacked list of headers that when clicked by the user reveal (expand) or hide (collapse) content associated with them. It is one way to expose content to users in a progressive manner.
EDSAccordion.name: Accordion
EDSAccordion.usage:
eds-accordion is a web component which provides expandable and collapsible subsection headers for a page. ```html

Accordion Panel 1 Content

Accordion Panel 2 Content

Accordion Panel 3 Content

 ``` The following CSS variables are available for styling : CSS Variable | Description :----------------|:------------- --eds-accordion-border-color | Border color of accordion menu --eds-accordion-text-color | Text color of accordion menu content --eds-accordion-additional-text-color | Text color of additional accordion menu content --eds-accordion-filled-header-background | Background color of filled header accordion menu --eds-accordion-focus-border-color | Border color of focused accordion menu

events.name: eds-accordion-open
